DataElement.preferredName: Solid Neoplasm Confirmation Response Assessment Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free text field to specify the assessment performed related to the verification of pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment of cancer of body tissues other than blood, bone marrow, or the lymphatic system.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to the verification of pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment of cancer of body tissues other than blood, bone marrow, or the lymphatic system.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Cancer of body tissues other than blood, bone marrow, or the lymphatic system.

Concepts.definition: A benign or malignant neoplasm arising from tissues that do not include fluid areas.  Representative examples include epithelial neoplasms (e.g. lung carcinoma, prostate carcinoma, breast carcinoma, colon carcinoma), and neoplasms arising from the soft tissues and bones (e.g. leiomyosarcoma, liposarcoma, chondrosarcoma, osteosarcoma).  Neoplasms originating from the blood or bone marrow (leukemias and myeloproliferative disorders) are not considered solid tumors.

Property.preferredDefinition: Having been established or verified.:The pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment. The changes may refer to eradication of detectable disease, stabilization of disease, or disease progression.

Concepts.definition: The pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment. The changes may include eradication of detectable disease, stabilization of disease, or disease progression.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The free text field to specify the assessment performed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Concepts.definition: Be specific about something; define clearly.
